Uses of Package
com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice

Packages that use com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice
com.i2group.apollo.client Contains interfaces and a class for interacting with the Intelligence Analysis Platform through the supplied Java client. 
com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.retrievalservice An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve live information from an external data provider that has already been the subject of data acquisition. 
com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetcreationservice An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data subset creation service provides users with the ability to perform search and expand operations against an appropriately configured external data provider through the Intelligence Portal user interface. 
com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice An Intelligence Analysis Platform external data subset exploration service provides clients with the ability to retrieve information from a subset of data that has been created from an external data provider. 
com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice The standard Intelligence Analysis Platform item retrieval service provides clients with the ability to retrieve any version of any stored item, alone or in groups, in a variety of ways.

Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in. 
com.i2group.apollo.searchservice The standard Intelligence Analysis Platform search service provides clients with the ability to perform searches of various types against the latest versions of data, and to retrieve scored search results.

Calls to methods in this service must include a SOAP header containing an element named <ApolloMetadata> with an attribute named TimeZone. The value of the TimeZone attribute indicates the time zone that the client requires dates and times to be sent and displayed in. 
 

Classes in com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice used by com.i2group.apollo.client
IItemRetrievalService
          A pair of methods for retrieving Items from the repository.
 

Classes in com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice used by com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.retrievalservice
TooManyItemsException
          The exception raised when an attempt is made to retrieve more items than the server allows.

          The exception raised when an attempt is made to retrieve more items than the server allows.
 

Classes in com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice used by com.i2group.apollo.externaldata.subsetexplorationservice

          The exception raised when an attempt is made to retrieve more items than the server allows.
 

Classes in com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice used by com.i2group.apollo.itemretrievalservice

          Contains information about the enclosing TooManyItemsException.

          The exception raised when an attempt is made to retrieve more items than the server allows.
